meaningMnemonic: You use a <radical>bamboo</radical> <radical>saw</radical> to cut down <radical>tree</radical>s to <kanji>construct</kanji> and <kanji>build</kanji> a building. The bamboo saw was crafted by a master bamboosmith, and cuts through trees with ease so you can quickly construct this new building.
readingMnemonic: As you <kanji>construct</kanji> and <kanji>build</kanji> this building, you hear a strange cheeping noise. Suddenly a <reading>chick</reading> (ちく) pops out of one of the logs you are building with. Then another, and another. You're surrounded by chicks! Is this because you used the magical(?) bamboo saw??
